T11bsa069_u:17: abhinnaṃ cedvacanamapi nāstīti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti bhavatā kathamucyate /
T11bsa069_u:19: tato vacanaṃ nyāyyamiti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti kathaṃ bhavatocyate /
T11bsa069_u:23: yathā gośṛṅge 'śvakarṇau vā parasparaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ na śaknuvataḥ /
T11bsa069_u:34: tato 'smadvacanaṃ bhavataśca khaṇḍanamityetayoretat khaṇḍanametacca khaṇḍanīyamiti viśeṣo na syāt /
T11bsa069_u:50: yato yadi kumārī putravatīti na sampadyate /
T11bsa069_u:59: yathā kaścinmanyeta śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyānupalabdhiratha śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyopalabdhiḥ pratyakṣasidveti,
T11bsa069_u:92: iha loke yadā phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadā sahetukaṃ jñātam /
T11bsa069_u:97: yad bhavatoktaṃ mama vacanamanyahisaṃvāditvāditi tadidamidānīṃ bhavatā sārdhaṃ vicārya nirdhāryate /
T11bsa069_u:103: yadi bhavadartho 'smaduktādanyastadānyatvadoṣo bhavata eva na tu mama /
T11bsa069_u:119: yadyāvayorbheda eva na syānna tadā bhavatā vivādo 'haṃ tu bhavadarthameva vadāmi /
T11bsa069_u:121: bhavatāpi kiñciduktamiti bhavānapyanyadvadatīti doṣo bhavata eva /
T11bsa069_u:123: tarhi mamāpi vacanaṃ nānyaditi yad bhavatoktamahamanyadvadāmīti tadayuktam /
T11bsa069_u:151: yadi bhavatocyate mama khaṇḍanamananubhāṣaṇameva tadā na mama matasyopalabdhi /
T11bsa069_u:153: tato mama khaṇḍanaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate /
T11bsa069_u:157: tadā bhavān khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknoti /
T11bsa069_u:158: kiṃ punarmanyate bhavān khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ śakyaṃ,
T11bsa069_u:167: na ca sa kālo vidyate yatra na khaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇam /
T11bsa069_u:168: [ataḥ] yatra khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate sa kālo nāsti /
T11bsa069_u:171: ananubhāṣya tu khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ ja śakyate /
T11bsa069_u:177: ananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti ced,
T11bsa069_u:178: ananubhāṣyāpi tataḥ prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyam /
T11bsa069_u:179: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanam nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti cet,
T11bsa069_u:180: dvitīyamapi khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyate /
T11bsa069_u:181: dvitīyaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ śakyata iti cet,
T11bsa069_u:187: tadā khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuaṃ śakyate natvananubhāṣya vaktavyam /
T11bsa069_u:197: yadā tvahaṃ bhavanmataṃ khaṇḍayāmi tadā bhavānapyanubhāṣate /
T11bsa069_u:203: aparañca / sarve śabdā yadā mukhānnirgatāstadā naṣṭā eveti kathaṃ madvacanānubhāṣaṇam? /
T11bsa069_u:210: tvadanubhāṣaṇāyaitanme vacanamiti yadbhavān bravīti sa kutarka eva /
T11bsa069_u:221: kiñca yadyucyate bhavatā sarvāṇi vacanāni pūrvavartīni khaṇḍanantu paravartīti,
T11bsa069_u:222: tadā bhavānapi pūrvameva vacanaṃ vadatīti paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:226: yacca khaṇḍanaṃ pūrvasya paravartīti svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścādasti /
T11bsa069_u:227: yadi svabhāvata eva pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ paścāt syāt,
T11bsa069_u:230: yadi svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścāt /
T11bsa069_u:232: tadā pūrvasyāpi khaṇḍanaṃ parabhāvi na bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:242: yadi hetvantarapratiṣṭhāpanādbhavato na nigrahasthānatvāpattistadā mamāpi tathā /
T11bsa069_u:251: api ca yadi sarvāṇi vacanāni hetvantarāṇi syustadābhavaduktāni vacanānyapi hetvantarāṇi bhaveyuḥ /
T11bsa069_u:253: atha vacanānyuccārayannapi na bhavān nigrāhyastarhi yadbhavatoktaṃ hetuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayannahaṃ nigrāhya iti tadayuktam /
T11bsa069_u:259: yadi matamasmadartho bhavadarthādananyastadāsmadartho bhavadarthapratipakṣatayā na virudvo /
T11bsa069_u:267: aparañca yaduktaṃ sarvaṃ tadarthāntarañcettadā bhavaduktamapyarthāntaraṃ bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:268: yadi bhavaduktamarthāntaraṃ na bhavettadā yadbhavatā pratijñātaṃ sarvamarthāntaramiti tadayuktam /
T11bsa069_u:285: anyacca / yathā mayā pūrvamuktamanityaḥ śabda iti /
T11bsa069_u:288: tataśca yadbhavatoktaṃ bhavān pūrvavacanaṃ vadatīti tanmithyā /
T11bsa069_u:295: ktaṃ mayā sarvamuktaṃ nānujñāyata iti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ)
T11bsa069_u:297: sarvaṃ nānujñāyata iti yaduktaṃ bhavatā etadvacanaṃ sarvasminnantarbhavati na vā? /
T11bsa069_u:298: yadi tāvatsarvasminnantarbhavati tadā bhavān svayaṃ svoktaṃ nānujānāti /
T11bsa069_u:299: yadi svayaṃ nānujānātyasmadarthaḥ svata eva siddho bhavedbhavavacanasya tu hāniḥ syāt /
T11bsa069_u:300: atha sarvasminnāntarbhavati tadā tasya sarvatvameva na syāt /
T11bsa069_u:313: yadi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ samyagarthena na saṃyuktaṃ syāttadā tadviparītakhaṇḍanamityucyate /
T11bsa069_u:328: śabdo 'pi tatheti śabdo 'nitya iti sthāpite prativādī prāha /
T11bsa069_u:334: yannityaṃ na tatprayatnenotpannaṃ yathākāśaṃ nityaṃ na prayatnenotpannam /
T11bsa069_u:350: prativādī tvanaikāntikaikarasārthapratyavasthānena khaṇḍanaṃ bhāṣate yathā yadi bhavān
T11bsa069_u:351: sādharmyeṇa śabdasyānityatāṃ sthāpayati tadāhamapi vaidharmyeṇa śabdasya nityatāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
T11bsa069_u:352: yadi ca bhavadarthaḥ siddho mamāpyarthaḥ siddho bhavediti /
T11bsa069_u:361: yadi bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpito heturasmaddhetutulyobhavettadā samyakkhaṇḍanaṃ sidhyeta /
T11bsa069_u:365: tadānityatāviparyāsadoṣo vyaktīkartuṃ na śakyata iti prasiddham /
T11bsa069_u:398: yo 'smābhiḥ sthāpito hetuḥ kṛtakatvācchabdo 'nitya iti tasya (hetoḥ)
T11bsa069_u:401: yaḥ punarbhavatpratiṣṭhāpito hetuḥ śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāditi tasya pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartata ityasiddho hetuḥ /
T11bsa069_u:428: bhavaddhetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartate tasmādasādhakaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:432: yadatulyaṃ tulyamiti bhavatoktaṃ tasmādbhavataḥ khaṇḍanaṃ viparītam /
T11bsa069_u:439: prativādī prāha yadi sādharmyādyathā ghaṭādyanityaṃ śabdo 'pi tathā syāttadā sarvasya sarveṇāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:444: sadharmāṇyapi sarvāṇi vastūni viśeṣṭavastubhyo bhinnānīti cecchabdo 'pi tathā /
T11bsa069_u:451: sarveṣāṃ na mayā sattvādisādharmyaṃ pratiṣidvamapi tu teṣāṃ viśeṣa evāvadhāryate /
T11bsa069_u:453: taccāsmābhiranityatāsādhanāyocyate na tu sādharmyamātramupādīyate na khalvasti sā kāpi yuktiryā naivaṃ vicāryate /
T11bsa069_u:455: naikamapi vidyate tādṛśaṃ yadanyavastuno na sadṛśaṃ na ca viśiṣṭaṃ syāt /
T11bsa069_u:478: yadi siddhā pratijñopādīyate 'siddhastu heturbhavataḥ khaṇḍanasya viparyāso 'dhikataro bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:479: sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ pūrvamabhūtvā paścādabhāva iti mayoktam /
T11bsa069_u:482: yadi pūrvaṃ śabdaḥ sanneva na cāsti pratibandhastadā kasmācchrotreṇa nopalabhyate /
T11bsa069_u:485: iṣṭasādhanaṃ ca na yuktisampannaṃ so 'rtho nirasanīyaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:489: atha hetuḥ sādhyaṃ na prāpnoti tadāpyasādhakaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:492: yadi hetuḥ sādhyaṃ prāpnoti tadā sādhyena saṃsargātsādhyaṃ na sādhayati /
T11bsa069_u:506: yadi bhavataḥ khaṇḍanamutpattihetusamāśritaṃ tadā siddhaṃ khaṇḍanam /
T11bsa069_u:509: uktaṃ mayā yaddhetuḥ sādhyaṃ notpādayatyapi tu parapratipādanārthaṃ sādhyaṃ vyanaktyavyāvṛttatvāt /
T11bsa069_u:514: yathā rūpasattve 'pi pradīpaprayojanaṃ tadvyañjanārthaṃ na tu tadutpattyartham /
T11bsa069_u:520: yadi tāvaddhetuḥ prāk sādhyañca paścāttadāsati sādhye,
T11bsa069_u:526: yathā yugapatsadbhāvāṅgoḥ śṛṅge dakṣiṇaṃ vāmaṃ vā parasparotpādake ityayuktam /
T11bsa069_u:531: tadeva hetunā vyajyate yathā dīpaḥ vidyamānānyeva vastūni vyanakti na tvavidyamānāni vastūnyutpādayati /
T11bsa069_u:532: bhavān punarutpattihetunā me vyañjakahetuṃ khaṇḍayati tasmādviparītametatkhaṇḍanaṃ,
T11bsa069_u:534: atha manyase yadyeṣa heturvyañjakaheturbhavati jñānābhāve sa kasya hetuḥ /
T11bsa069_u:536: tadā prāptikriyāsambhave heturnāma nopapadyate kriyāsadbhāve tu heturnāmopapadyate /
T11bsa069_u:538: taduktaṃ bhavati pūrvaṃ heturnāma nopapadyate paścāttu heturnāmopapadyate /
T11bsa069_u:539: yaccābhihitaṃ hetuḥ prāk kriyā tu paścāditi tadadoṣam /
T11bsa069_u:551: yadi prayatna[ānantarīyaka]tvācchabdo 'nityastadā yatra prayatno na vidyate tatra nityatāprasaṅgaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:552: yathā vidyudvāyvādīnyaprayatna [ānantarīyaka]āṇyanityeṣu cāntarbhūtāni tasmādanityatve sādhye na prayatnamātraṃ samāśrayaṇīyaṃ prayatnasyāsādhanatvāt
T11bsa069_u:553: sādhanañcedyatra yatra prayatno nāsti tatra tatra nityatāyāḥ sambhavaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:563: yathā kasyacitpratijñā syāt sarve taravo divyacetanā iti /
T11bsa069_u:569: śirīṣa eva svapiti na tvapare taravaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:570: sa svapno na sarvāṃstarūn vyāpnoti tasmātsarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ divyacetanatvapratiṣṭhāpane svapno 'samarthaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:574: naitaducyate mayā yatprayatnaḥ sarvānityatākhyāpane samartho heturanye tu hetavo 'samarthāḥ /
T11bsa069_u:587: yadyahaṃ bravīmi yadyadanityaṃ tattatsarvaṃ prayatnasamutpannamiti tadā prayatnotpattihetoravyāpitvādasiddhatvamiti bhavatā khaṇḍanaṃ vaktavyam
T11bsa069_u:597: yatsamutpannaṃ tatprayatena vyaktaṃ yathā mūlakīlakodakaṃ prayatnena vyaktaṃ na tu prayatnena samutpannam /
T11bsa069_u:602: kiṃ ghatavadasamutpannaḥ samutpadyate mūlakīlodakavatsamutpanno vā vyajyate?
T11bsa069_u:610: api tu yataḥ prayatnena samutpannastasmācchabdo 'nitya iti /
T11bsa069_u:630: yadi bhavato ghaṭadhvaṃsasya dhvaṃse sadbhāvastataḥ sadbhāvāddhvaṃsābhāvaḥ syāt /
T11bsa069_u:649: yatprayatnenopalabhyate yacca prayatnena kriyate tadubhayaṃ bhinnamiti bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpitam /
T11bsa069_u:655: yaccocyate yadabhivyaktaṃ nityamiti tasya kiṃ prayojanam /
T11bsa069_u:660: prayatna iti vacanaṃ śabdasyānityatāheturiti cettadā kiṃ prāpyate? (Tś 23)
T11bsa069_u:666: asmābhiḥ sthāpito heturabhivyaktyartho notpattyartho na vā vināśārthaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:670: yadi vināśahetunā mām khaṇḍayati bhavān tadviparītakhaṇḍanaṃ syāt /
T11bsa069_u:671: 10. kāryabhedakhaṇḍanam- kāryyabhedād ghaṭavatacchabda iti na vaktavyam /
T11bsa069_u:673: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi sthāpite prativādī prāha ghaṭaśabdayoḥ kāryabhedaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:678: api tu sarvāṇi vastūni tulyena nyāyena kṛtakatvād anityānītyevamuktam /
T11bsa069_u:731: ghaṭasya nityatā sthāpitā śabdo 'pi nityetāhetumantareṇa nityo bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:754: meghe satyapi tu kadācidṛṣṭirbhavati kadācinna bhavatītyanaikāntikatā /
T11bsa069_u:757: dhūme dṛṣṭe satyagniranumīyate dhūme tvasati agnerabhāvaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:781: asādharmyaṃ yacchabdaḥ śravaṇagrāhyo 'mūrtaśca ghaṭastu cakṣurgrāhyo mūrtaśca /
T11bsa069_u:794: (Tś 27) yadi sato nityavaṃ siddhastadā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sada khaṇḍanam /
T11bsa069_u:809: vastu sahetukañcet tadānityamiti jñeyaṃ ghaṭādivaditi sthāpite /
T11bsa069_u:830: yadi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavādivyatiriktaṃ syāttadā pṛthaktvena grāhyaṃ draṣṭavyañca (Tś 28)
T11bsa069_u:831: sāmānyantu gavādivyatiriktaṃ pṛthaktvena gṛhyate na ca dṛśyate /
T11bsa069_u:867: kṛṣṇo bandhyāputraḥ śveta iti tadapi siddham bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:882: etatritayamaprayatna[ānantarīya] kaṃ bhavatā tvekena prakāreṇa nityamiti manyate /
T11bsa069_u:894: yadi kaścidvadedandhakāre prabhāstīti tadvacanamapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:897: anityateti pṛthagdharmo 'nityena na sambaddhaḥ yo nityo mantavyaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:899: yadyanutpannaṃ vastūtpattiṃ labhata utpannantu vinaśyati tato 'nityamityucyate /
T11bsa069_u:914: yadi hetuḥ pūrvaṃ pratijñā tu paścāt,
T11bsa069_u:918: yadi bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ pūrvamasmatpratijñā tu paścādasmadarthābhāve kiṃ bhavatā khaṇḍyate /
T11bsa069_u:919: yadyasmatpratijñā pūrvaṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ tu paścāttadāsmatpratijñāyāṃ sthāpitāyāṃ kiṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanena /
T11bsa069_u:922: mayā prakaṭitaṃ yadbhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavadarthameva pratiṣedhati na tu bhavatkhaṇḍanamavalambyāsmadartho pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:940: dvitīyo mūrdhā rūpagandhādimūrdhākārato na pṛthak mantavyaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:948: sa tu sanniti tadā dvitīyo mūrdhaviśeṣyo 'pi sanneva bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:949: dvitīyo mūrdhā sanniti bhavatā cenna pratipādyate tadātmanyapi tathā pratipattavyam /
T11bsa069_u:953: tadāhamapi nyāyāsamaśrayātsanneva dvitīyo mūrdhā na tvātmeti cedvadeyameṣo 'rthaḥ sidvo bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:954: athāsmadartho na siddho bhavadartho 'pi na sidva ityucyate prasaṅgavyaktiḥ /
T11bsa069_u:955: anyacca / ātmā dvitīya iva mūrdhāviśeṣyaḥ na tvasanniti cettadā vaiṣamyadoṣo bhavanmūrdhyāpatet /
T11bsa069_u:956: yadi kaścidvadedvandhyāputraḥ sālaṅkāro bandhyāputro niralaṅkāra iti tadapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
T11bsa069_u:961: nyāyāsamāśrayānniyatameva nāsti dvitīyo mūrdheti siddhaṃ ca tadvacanamiti tadā (Tś 32)
T11bsa069_u:964: grāhyoḥ vāyurityādi mūrkhavacanāninyāyāsamāśritānyapi bhavatsādhyavat siddhāni bhaveyuḥ /
T11bsa069_u:1002: śabda ākāśasādharmyannitya iti cettato yadi vaidharmyaṃ syāt,
T11bsa069_u:1007: sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā na mayā samālocyate /
T11bsa069_u:1015: vaidharmyaṃ tu sarvamanityaṃ nityavyatiriktamiti niścitaṃ vyanakti /
T11bsa069_u:1026: asparśatvahetunā nityaḥ śabda iti bhavatā sthāpitam /
T11bsa069_u:1032: yadi heturasiddhastadā pratijñāpyasiddheti prasiddhamiti pratyavasthita idamāha /
T11bsa069_u:1033: śabdo nityatā ceti na mama pratijñā /
T11bsa069_u:1036: yo mayā nirdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sa rūpādiniṣedhārthaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:1040: śabdo nityatāyā na vyatiricyate śrotragrāhyādikāttu vyatiricyate /
T11bsa069_u:1044: mayā na śabdo na ca nityatā sthāpyate /
T11bsa069_u:1055: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha bhavatoktaṃ sarvamanityaṃ tasmānnityaḥ śabda iti /
T11bsa069_u:1073: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha nityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvāditi bhavatoktam /
T11bsa069_u:1078: tathā hi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavāderabhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ vā /
T11bsa069_u:1082: gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśeta na tu gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśate tasmāddṛṣṭānto na nityatāsādhakaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:1084: (Tś 36) iti dūṣaṇe kṛte prativādī prāha kenaitatsthāpitam /
T11bsa069_u:1097: yathā vāyoḥ sparśasya ca sakṛdevābhivaktavāpi vāyuranityaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:1104: pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā śabdo nityo dviranabhivyaktatvādityadhunā tūcyate śabdo vāyuvilakṣaṇaḥ pṛthagindriyagrāhyatvāditi prathamahetutyāgena bhavata hetvantaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
T11bsa069_u:1118: yadi kaściddharmaṃ vakti pariṣattu prativādī ca jijñāsāvapi trirabhihitaṃ jñātumasamarthau /
T11bsa069_u:1120: aṇuramūrtaḥ sukhotpādakaḥ duḥkhotpādako 'prāpto sāpakarṣotkarṣaḥ samito 'sannyāso na vināśaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:1127: daśavidhaṃ phalaṃ trividhaḥ kaṃbala ekavidhaṃ pānabhojanametadapārthakamucyate /
T11bsa069_u:1131: yathā pārimāṇḍalyāśrayasya paramāṇornityatvātpārimāṇḍalyaṃ nityaṃ śabdasyāpi tathātvasambhava iti kṛte 'paraḥ prāha /
T11bsa069_u:1137: atrāparaḥ / yathā gṛhe dagdhe tatparitrāṇāyodakānveṣaṇaṃ tathānavasare 'rtharakṣaṇāya hetusthāpanam /
T11bsa069_u:1139: 11. nyūnam / pañcāvayavā anyatamena hīnā iti nyūnam /
T11bsa069_u:1145: yadvastu kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtako 'nityaśceti tṛtīyo 'vayavaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:1158: atha sādhanasamarthastadā kiṃ hetubāhulyena udāharaṇabahulye 'pi tathātvasambhavaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:1170: satyaṃ saṃsāro duḥkhaṃ satyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sukham /
T11bsa069_u:1176: yadi na kiñcit prakaṭayitavyaṃ tadā tadaprayojanam /
T11bsa069_u:1181: 15. ajñānam / pariṣadā vijñātāyā api pratijñāyāḥ kenacidavijñānamajñānamucyate /
T11bsa069_u:1182: 16. apratibhā / yadi parasya pratijñāṃ nyāyavadīkṣate dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastadāpratibhā /
T11bsa069_u:1186: yadi kaścidarthaṃ na vijānāti dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastena saha vādo na kartavya iti /
T11bsa069_u:1193: 17. vikṣepaḥ / svapratijñāyā doṣaṃ jñātvā vyājaiḥ parihāraḥ kāryāntarakathanam /
T11bsa069_u:1196: tadā tu yadi nāpakrāmati paradūṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ na kalpayati /
T11bsa069_u:1209: tadarthe ca hīne kiṃ prayojanaṃ dūṣaṇena /
T11bsa069_u:1218: pūrvaṃ caturvidhe siddhānte svayamaṅgīkṛte 'pi paścāccedyathāsiddhāntaṃ na brūyādayamapasiddhāntaḥ /
T11bsa069_u:1230: yaḥ saśṛṅga sa gaurityanaikāntikaḥ chāgarurvādīnāṃ saśṛṅgatvāt /
T11bsa069_u:1238: yadi kenacideṣa hetuḥ prayujyate tadā hetvābhāsanigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
